name: Gnash (Skyrgamur)
description:
Play the role as a werewolf running amok on a small town. Defend yourself from the hunters who will stop at nothing to see an end to your rampage, all the while your condition worsens.

Gnash is a short arcade-like action game with a simple goal: kill or be killed. This is my first foray into creating a complete game in the unreal engine and I gave myself a self-imposed time limit of a month to finish it, which I overshot by about a week. Try it out and tell me what you think, any feedback is appreciated!
